scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run generate-routes && npm run build:client && npm run dev:server
scripts.dev:client: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx/esm" vite build --outDir build/client --manifest --ssrManifest && npm run build:seria
scripts.build: npm run generate-routes && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx/esm" vite build --outDir build/client --manifest --ssrManifest && npm run build:seria
scripts.build:server: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx/esm" vite build --outDir build/server --ssr ./src/entry.server.tsx
